description.value:
You unleash an ejection of plasma, hitting every creature in your choice of a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] or in a @Template[type:line|distance:30]. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[((1 + floor(@actor.level / 2))d6)[fire]|options:area-damage,plasma-ejection-base-damage] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:solarian|basic|options:area-effect] save against your class DC. A creature that critically fails its save additionally takes @Damage[1d8[persistent,electricity]] damage.

Graviton-Attuned A creature that fails its save is knocked @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Prone].

Photon-Attuned Increase the fire damage to d8s.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6 (or 1d8 if you're photon-attuned).
